name: Two Jobs
description:
A game I made for Ludum Dare 35 in under 48h

This is a mix between classic Breakout game and Space Invaders. Shapeshift between the breakout pad and the Space Invaders ship.

GOAL
Destroy every alien and break every brick to move on to the next level.

CONTROLS
Move : mouse
Change shape : mouse wheel
Shoot : mouse left button

Ludum Dare page
